channel.title: Getting rid of flames on my client
channel.description:
hey everyone.. i just downloaded a client and ive been customizing it but there is flames on my login screen like the ones on runescape and they don't quite go with the backround at all.. anyone know how to get rid of the flames?
id post a picture of what i'm talking bout but i don't really know how... sorry it would be greatly appreciated...
